Text.Name: Talk_XianKong
Text.Hate.0: Seeing you makes me feel like I've wasted my effort practicing today.
Text.Hate.1: Why are you still in this state? Breakthrough failed again?
Text.Submiss.0: (Waves) Here, bring us the best treasures.
Text.Submiss.1: Come here. Pick whatever treasures you like.
Text.GiftLike.0: Very good. Are you a mind reader? How did you know I like that?
Text.GiftLike.1: I was pretty down today, but this picked me up.
Text.LowValueGift.0: I can use this to light my cigarettes.
Text.LowValueGift.1: Are you for real? Usually, I wouldn't take something like this.
